1: <pb/><t>Calec vach' lolonel d'a Jehová.</t> <t>D'a val smasanil in c'ool ol val vach' lolonel d'a Jehová.</t>
2: <t>Yacb'an pitzan into ol val vach' lolonel d'ay. Yacb'an ayinto eq'ui, ol in b'itan d'a in Diosal.</t>
3: <t>Man̈ eyac'och anima nivan yelc'och yipoc e c'ool, yujto animan̈ej eb', yuj chi' max yal-laj scolvaj eb'.</t>
4: <t>Ayic scham eb', tz'ochcan eb' pococal. A d'a jun c'u chi' slajvicanel tastac sna eb' sc'ulej.</t>
5: <t>Te vach' yic mach schaan scolval sDiosal vin̈aj Jacob. An̈ej Jehová Dios chi' ayoch yipoc sc'ool.</t>
6: <t>A Jehová b'oannac satchaan̈, lum luum, a' mar yed' masanil tastac ay d'a junjun macan̈ chi'. Tz'eln̈ejc'och tas syala'.</t>
7: <t>A' sb'oan yaj b'aj tz'ixtaj eb' anima, syac'anpax svael eb' ay svejel. A' scolanel eb' ayoch d'a preso.</t>
8: <t>A Jehová sjacan sat eb' max ujilaj yilani, squetzan q'ue vaan eb' stelvi. Xajan eb' anima vach' spensar yuuj.</t>
9: <t>A Jehová scolan eb' anima ch'oc chon̈ab'il. An̈ejton pax a' tz'ilan eb' unin chamnac smam yed' eb' ix ix chamnac yetb'eyum. Palta tz'ac'ji somchaj eb' sc'ulan chucal yuuj.</t>
10: <t>Ex aj Sion, a Jehová ol ac'an Yajalil d'a masanil tiempo. A co Diosal ol och Reyal d'a juneln̈ej.</t> <t>Calec vach' lolonel d'a Jehová.</t>
